text:
March 12, 1959
Dr* Maurice F* Seay, Director
Division of Education
W. K* Kellogg Foundation
250 Champion Street
Battle Creek, Michigan
Dear Maurice:
I'm not sure if you've had a chance to use them yet or not, and I
don* t want to rush you unduly â€” * However, for certain meetings
and guests, we could make use of the slides I sent you, from time
to time*
I've been a bit too busy to be chatty lately. I hope all goes
well with you. We're still snowed in, and a little humbled by
weather's reminder to us, this winter, of its power.
Sincerely,
HJSsJO
Harry J. Skomia
Executive Director
